example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC بعد) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN ادخال) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الذخائر))) (PP (PREP الى) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN كنيسة) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الدير)))))) (PUNC ,) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS تهافت) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_NOM المؤمنون)) (PP (PREP الى) (NP (DET+NOUN التبرك) (CONJ و) (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الصلاة)))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: To get their blessings and prayer
